article_title: Swedish Border Checks Come Into Force
article_text:
Sweden introduced border checks on Thursday, reversing its long-standing open-arms policy toward migrants, and urged fellow European Union members to reconsider the bloc’s treasured policy of visa-free travel.

Swedish police began enforcing controls at noon, asking samples of passengers entering by trains, cars and ferries traveling from Denmark and Germany to show their travel documents. Those lacking valid entry permits were asked to apply for asylum in Sweden or face deportation back to Denmark or Germany. Previously,...
